name: 10 Questions about Calvin and Hobbes | Entertainment

questions.text: Which one of these is NOT one of Calvin's inventions?
Which of these is NOT a Calvin and Hobbes book?
Everytime Calvin doesn't want to do something, what is the reason his dad gives him for doing it?
From what household (or backyard) item, is Calvin's time machine made?
Which of these is NOT one of Calvin's alter egos?
Which one of these things HASN'T tried to attack Calvin?
What is the name of Calvin's teacher?
What is the name of the bully that always picks on Calvin?
What does Calvin's club, G.R.O.S.S., stand for?
questions.correct: Get Rid Of Slimy girlS & get rid of slimy girls & Get Rid Of Slimy Girls
questions.explanation: Get Rid Of Slimy girlS & get rid of slimy girls & Get Rid Of Slimy Girls.
